sentences.en: A good critical theory, nevertheless, has its own kind of validity.
sentences.cn: 不过, 好的批评理论有它自己的正确性.

sentences.en: Article 12 The term of validity of an import licence shall be one year.
sentences.cn: 第十二条进口货物许可证的有效期限为一年.

sentences.en: Does this argument satisfy the definition of validity or does it not?
sentences.cn: 这个论点满足有效性的定义吗？,还是不满足？

sentences.en: He is then more generously disposed to admit the validity of opposing views.
sentences.cn: 他那时更愿意大度地承认反方观点的正确性。

sentences.en: I would question the validity of that assumption.
sentences.cn: 我会质疑那个假设的正当性.

sentences.en: It was for the police to assess the validity or otherwise of the evidence.
sentences.cn: 应该由警方来判定证据有效与否。

sentences.en: Physicists believe in the validity of conservation laws.
sentences.cn: 物理学家们对于各种守恒定律的有效性一直是坚信不疑的.

sentences.en: Scientists are becoming increasingly unsure of the validity of this technique.
sentences.cn: 科学家们越来越拿不准这一技术是否正当合法。

sentences.en: Shocked by the results of the elections, they now want to challenge the validity of the vote.
sentences.cn: 选举结果令他们很震惊，他们现在要对选举的可信性提出质疑。

sentences.en: So that satisfies the definition of validity.
sentences.cn: 所以这满足了有效性的定义。

sentences.en: Some people, of course, denied the validity of any such claim.
sentences.cn: 当然，一些人否定了此类说法的合理性。

sentences.en: The criticisms have at least an element of truth and validity.
sentences.cn: 那些批评至少有一丝真实性和合理性。

sentences.en: The editorial in the Financial Times says this argument has lost much of its validity.
sentences.cn: 《金融时报》的社论认为这个观点已不太令人信服。

sentences.en: The period of validity of the agreement has expired.
The tests have been shown to be of dubious validity.
sentences.cn: 这些试验的有效性已显得令人怀疑.

sentences.en: The validity of the hypothesis can be tested.
sentences.cn: 这种假说的可靠性是经得起考验的.

sentences.en: We had doubts about the validity of their argument.
sentences.cn: 我们对他们的论点的正确性有过怀疑。

sentences.en: We should question the validity of those figures.
sentences.cn: 我们应当查询那些数字的正确性.

sentences.en: While each of these might have some validity, in many cases the same general comments may also apply to many of the other projects you work on.
sentences.cn: 尽管其中每个问题可能具有某些正确性，但是在许多情况下，一般性评论还可能适用于您从事的其他项目。

words.tran_cn: 有效的，有根据的；正当的
确认（validate的过去式及过去分词形式）；使生效

phrases.tran_cn: 内容效度；内容有效性，内容正确性
外在效度，外部效度；外部有效性；外部真实性

trans.tran_cn: 有效，合法性，效力，正确，正当，正确性
